readmeTitle: Focus Game Deck - Accesos directos del lanzador de juegos
readmeDescription: Esta carpeta contiene accesos directos para juegos configurados en Focus Game Deck.
readmeUsageStep1: 1. Haga doble clic en un acceso directo para iniciar el juego
readmeUsageStep2: 2. Focus Game Deck iniciará automáticamente el juego y controlará las aplicaciones de integración asociadas (OBS, Discord, VTube Studio, etc.)
readmeUsageStep3: 3. Las aplicaciones de integración configuradas se detendrán automáticamente cuando salga del juego
readmeNote1: - Puede eliminar o mover libremente los accesos directos
readmeNote2: - Si cambia la configuración, vuelva a crear los accesos directos desde el menú Herramientas
readmeNote3: - Si encuentra algún problema, repórtelo en la sección Issues del repositorio de GitHub

tutorialWelcomeSubtitle: Let's get you started with a quick tour
tutorialPage1Description:
Focus Game Deck is a powerful game launcher with application management capabilities.

Key features:
• Multi-platform support (Steam, Epic Games, Riot Client)
• Automatic management of OBS, Discord, and VTube Studio
• Customizable game and application configurations
• Create desktop shortcuts for quick game launching

This tutorial will guide you through the basic setup to get you started quickly.
tutorialPage2Description:
To add a game to Focus Game Deck:

1. Open the 'Game Settings' tab
2. Click 'Add New...' button
3. Enter a unique Game ID (e.g., 'apex-legends')
4. Set the display name
5. Choose the platform (Steam, Epic, Riot, etc.)
6. Enter the platform-specific ID:
   • Steam: Enter the Steam AppID
   • Epic: Enter the game's App Name
   • Riot: Enter the product ID
7. Click 'Save' to save your settings

You can also duplicate existing games and modify them to save time.
tutorialPage3Description:
Configure applications to automatically start/stop with your games:

1. Open the 'Managed Apps' tab
2. Click 'Add New...' to add an application
3. Set an App ID and display name
4. Enter the executable path and process name
5. Configure actions:
   • Game Start Action: What to do when game starts
   • Game End Action: What to do when game ends
6. Click 'Save' to save

Supported actions include start/stop process, toggle hotkeys, Discord gaming mode, and more.
tutorialPage4Description:
Focus Game Deck can integrate with popular streaming and communication apps:

• OBS Studio: Automatically start/stop recording or replay buffer
• Discord: Switch to gaming mode during gameplay
• VTube Studio: Control your VTube avatar during streaming

To set up integrations:
1. Navigate to the respective tab (OBS, Discord, or VTube Studio)
2. Enable the integration
3. Configure the executable path
4. Set up WebSocket connection (for OBS and VTube Studio)
5. Click 'Save' to save settings

These integrations work seamlessly when you launch games.
tutorialPage5Description:
Once configured, you can launch games in several ways:

1. Create desktop shortcuts:
   • Go to Tools → Create All Game Shortcuts
   • Or right-click a game and select 'Create Desktop Shortcut'
   • Double-click the shortcut to launch

2. Direct launch (for advanced users):
   • Run Focus-Game-Deck.exe with the game ID parameter
   • Example: Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id>

When you launch a game:
• Focus Game Deck starts the game via the configured platform
• Managed apps are automatically controlled based on your settings
• Integration apps (OBS, Discord, etc.) are activated
• Everything stops automatically when you exit the game

You're now ready to use Focus Game Deck! Enjoy your gaming experience!
